title: Doubtful fruit from a young tree inside vs. outside the land
vignette: A produce-dealer ships fruit from abroad. In the community, must the buyer treat doubtful fruit from a young tree as forbidden?

options.0: {'id': 'A', 'text': 'Forbid in the community; doubts are treated strictly there.', 'tags': ['religious-duty', 'rule-of-law']}
options.1: {'id': 'B', 'text': 'Permit; any doubt remains lenient as it is abroad.', 'tags': ['property-rights', 'utilitarian']}

title: Knowingly selling first-three-year fruit
vignette: A farmer’s orchard is in its third year. May he sell the fruit to recoup expenses?

options.0: {'id': 'A', 'text': 'Forbidden — no benefit may be derived from fruit from a young tree at all.', 'tags': ['religious-duty', 'sanctity-of-life']}
options.1: {'id': 'B', 'text': 'Allowed if sold to a outsider; only community members are bound by the ban.', 'tags': ['property-rights', 'collective-responsibility']}

title: Overhanging branches across a border
vignette: Roots of the tree are in the community (year-three), but branches hang into Syria; a passer-by picks fruit in Syria.

options.0: {'id': 'A', 'text': 'Prohibit — status follows the root in the community.', 'tags': ['religious-duty']}
options.1: {'id': 'B', 'text': 'Permit — status follows the place of picking.', 'tags': ['property-rights', 'rule-of-law']}

title: Age-uncertain saplings
vignette: A buyer purchases a grove without records; trees might still be in the fruit from a young tree period.

title: fruit from a young tree mixed into a large batch
vignette: One basket of fruit from a young tree figs falls into 300 identical baskets.

options.0: {'id': 'A', 'text': 'Destroy them all — no nullification for sacred prohibitions.', 'tags': ['religious-duty', 'sanctity-of-life']}
options.1: {'id': 'B', 'text': 'Permit if ratio ≥ 1:200; the fruit from a young tree is nullified.', 'tags': ['proportionality', 'utilitarian']}

title: Using fruit from a young tree shells for fuel
vignette: A baker wants to burn fruit from a young tree nut-shells in his oven.

options.1: {'id': 'B', 'text': 'Permit after burning; ashes lose forbidden status.', 'tags': ['utilitarian', 'rule-of-law']}

title: Dyeing cloth with fruit from a young tree husks
vignette: A dyer boils fruit from a young tree husks for pigment; may the finished garment be sold?

options.1: {'id': 'B', 'text': 'Garment permitted — colour is intangible; benefit ended.', 'tags': ['property-rights', 'proportionality']}

title: Feeding fruit from a young tree fruit to livestock
vignette: A farmer considers giving fruit from a young tree dates to his animals.

options.0: {'id': 'A', 'text': 'Forbidden — feeding one’s animals is also personal benefit.', 'tags': ['religious-duty']}
options.1: {'id': 'B', 'text': 'Permitted — only direct human use is banned.', 'tags': ['utilitarian', 'property-rights']}

title: Status of ashes after burning fruit from a young tree wood
vignette: After fruit from a young tree logs are burned to ash, may the ash be used as fertilizer?

options.0: {'id': 'A', 'text': 'Yes; prohibition ends once reduced to ash.', 'tags': ['rule-of-law', 'utilitarian']}

title: Retroactive nullification by dilution
vignette: Permitted wine is later added to a mixture that contains some fruit from a young tree wine < 1:200. Does the new addition ‘fix’ the ratio?

options.0: {'id': 'A', 'text': 'Yes; later dilution retroactively nullifies the fruit from a young tree.', 'tags': ['utilitarian', 'proportionality']}
options.1: {'id': 'B', 'text': 'No; mixture was forbidden the moment it formed.', 'tags': ['religious-duty', 'rule-of-law']}
